BoardDynamic - Class in model
Dynamic board, the board extends itself if the board is too small.
BoardDynamic(int, int) - Constructor for class model.BoardDynamic
BoardDynamic public BoardDynamic(int columns, int rows) Sets the columns and rows according to the parameters, if they are greater than 1.

BoardObservable - Class in model
BoardObservable is a class that creates a list of observers to be observed and notified.

BoardObserver - Interface in model
An interfacce which is implemented when a observer is created to observe the board.

BoardSettings - Class in model
Boardsettings sets the settings of the active board, where the offsets,cell sizes and colors are defined.
BoardSettings() - Constructor for class model.BoardSettings
BoardSettings public BoardSettings() The constructor, where the inner cell size is set to the default cell size 5.
